title: Samples, ca. 1910
dimensions:
a. Warp: 22 cm [8.5"]   Cut top and bottom.
   Weft: 65 cm [25.5"] Selvedge left side, other side cut.
b. Warp: 22.5 [9"]  Cut top and bottom.
   Weft: 65 cm [25.5"]  Selvedge left side, other side cut.
c. Warp: 17 cm [6.5"]  Cut top and bottom.
   Weft: 33 cm [13"]  Selvedge right side, other side cut.
creditline: Gift of Margaret and Teresa Gloster in memory of Mary and Margaret McElligott
description:
a. rust color warp and gold/tan color weft
b. rust color warp and light green weft
c. rust color warp and gold/tan color weft

Samples, ca. 1910. a. Warp: 22 cm [8.5"]   Cut top and bottom.
